archimate:ApplicationProcess.name: Unweight Pelvis
archimate:ApplicationProcess.documentation: Continue to press your ribcage into the ground and pull your pelvis/pubic bone up with your abdominals until you feel your pelvis is no longer a major support zone with the ground. Your Back Anchor Zone is now pushing into the ground and is your major support zone. Your Back Anchor Zone (the bottom of your rib cage in the back) is acting like a fulcrum to unweight your pelvis.
